title: Lando Norris: ‘I’m letting the team down’
summary: With a possible world title at stake, the McLaren intra-team battle between Oscar Piastri and Lando Norris is beginning to take shape. So far it’s been characterised by Piastri’s flat-line…

qa_pairs.question: Which team do Lando Norris and Oscar Piastri drive for in Formula 1?
What is a common term used to describe a driver's performance consistently improving or remaining stable?
In Formula 1, what is often at stake when drivers are competing closely within a team?
